name: FEED THAT PORO
description: FEED THAT PORO is a top-down casual shooter game, come and feed these Poro with cookie gun to build your Poro farm or even Poro kingdom! How to play?  Every once in a while Poro will be eager to eat cookies, feed Poro at this time, and you can get coins and score rewards, if Poro is hungry, then the game is over :( Poro has the trait of exploding in two when fed, but be aware that whenever you feed them they will eventually explode. As you get more and more Poro on the field, you'll unlock achievements, so choose your own game way! Move: WASD    Shoot Cookies: Mouse Button    Pause: Q    Upgrade Gun: E
